role_description: An Ansible role that installs fpm (a tool for quickly and easily building packages such as rpms, debs, OSX packages, etc.) on Linux and macOS
role_description_full_overview: [fpm](https://github.com/jordansissel/fpm) (short for Effing package management) allows you to build packages for multiple platforms with great ease. The source of your package can be a gem, Python module, pear, directory, .tar.gz, rpm, deb, Node.js package, or pacman package. The target packages it supports are deb, rpm, solaris, freebsd, tar, directory, Mac OS X .pkg file, or pacman package.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs fpm (a tool for quickly and easily building packages such as rpms, debs, OSX packages, etc.) on Linux and macOS.
